name: Theoreol
text:
It's good to see you again, [Player].
I appreciate you answering my summons.

name: Theoreol
text: Now then, the reason I've come to you like this is—

name: Theoreol
text:
During my journey,
I came across an interesting broadcast about Earth.

name: Theoreol
text:
They hand over a food called chocolate,
and at the same time express their feelings...
It's a truly fascinating event!

name: Theoreol
text:
To concisely express specific feelings,
they not only use words,
but also hand over food at the same time.

name: Theoreol
text:
From the perspective of transmitting intentions without discrepancy to the other party,
it is indeed quite rational, wouldn't you agree?

name: Theoreol
text:
Well, I've explained the circumstances.
Let's immediately go and investigate the reality!
By observing the act of handing over food—

name: Theoreol
text: This, to me...?

name: Theoreol
text:
I see, truly interesting.
Thank you, [Player]!

name: Theoreol
text:
...However, this is different from what I expected.
You said that by accepting this, your feelings would be fully conveyed—

name: Theoreol
text:
...Something is missing.
Rather than just receiving food,
I want to hear your words more.

name: Theoreol
text:
This is a difficult sensation to comprehend.
An efficient act to convey feelings,
and yet to feel "unsatisfied" by it.

name: Theoreol
text:
...However, I also understand this at the same time.
This event is about enjoying the imperfection itself.
Is that right?

name: Theoreol
text:
Sharing an imperfect endeavor with you,
that is something I... feel "happy" about.

name: Theoreol
text: [Player], this.Prepared when I investigated the event beforehand.

name: Theoreol
text:
...Did you also feel something lacking?
Did you wish to convey words to me as well?
Please, rest assured!

name: Theoreol
text:
If you ingest it,
you won't be able to help but put all your thoughts into words.
Now we can exchange plenty of words.

name: Theoreol
text:
The ingredients are "mostly" chocolate,
so there probably aren't any health effects.
Since it's not medicine, I won't get scolded—

name: Theoreol
text:
...Eh!? Are there regulations on food too?
...I see, I'll update my records.

name: Theoreol
text:
Well then, let's prepare safe and delicious chocolate again.
[Player], after this—

name: Theoreol
text:
Please guide me around this planet.
Yes... Just by exchanging words.

name: Theoreol
text:
Accumulating knowledge of this event,
and of you.

name: Theoreol
text:
I think that spending such
inefficient time with you is truly meaningful.
